      • invert

        public static final int[] invert​(int[] indices,
                                 int L)
        Invert - take the compliment of indices up to length L, e.g., if indices = [3,5,6], then invert(indices,7) = [1,2,4,7].
        Parameters:
        indices - indices
        L - supposed length of the compliment
        Returns:
        the compliment (inverted list)

      • toDoubleArray

        public static final double[] toDoubleArray​(int i,
                                           int L)
        Convert integer to binary string (double representation) of L digits. e.g., toDoubleArray(3,4) = [0., 0., 1., 1.]
